definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: This method is also suitable for the theodolite with a contract index level.
sentences.chinese: 这个方法也适合于一般具有竖盘符合水准器的经纬仪。

sentences.english: Geodetic theodolites generally have circles of about 140mm diameter.
sentences.chinese: 大地经纬仪的度盘直径一般为140毫米。

sentences.english: The optical theodolite can be used in measuring the shape and position of a super - big workpiece.
sentences.chinese: 用光学经纬仪可以对超大工件的形状和位置进行检测。

sentences.english: Dynamic angle measuring system has been employed in electronic theodolites.
sentences.chinese: 电子经纬仪采用了动态测角系统。

sentences.english: The methods of optical-eletronic theodolite calibration in the range were studied.
sentences.chinese: 对光电经纬仪外场星校方法进行了研究。

sentences.english: It is used for mfg. transit to raise precision and lower cost.
sentences.chinese: 用于制造经纬仪等设备以提高精度减少成本。

sentences.english: When you see a planet by a transit, the orbit has to be in your line of sight.
sentences.chinese: 当你通过经纬仪看到行星，其轨道应该在你的视线中。

sentences.english: The Theodolite Main Controller is the relay center of communications between theodolites and central computers.
sentences.chinese: 经纬仪主控器是经纬仪与中心机的通信枢纽。

sentences.english: The Theodolite Main Controller is the relay center of communications between theodolites and central computers.
sentences.chinese: 经纬仪主控器是经纬仪与中心机的通信枢纽。

sentences.english: The traditional metrological verification instrument for theodolite has many disadvantages.
sentences.chinese: 传统的经纬仪计量检测设备存在诸多缺点。

sentences.english: The FOG north-finder and laser collimation theodolite are assembled to achieve orientation and aiming integral.
sentences.chinese: 提出了光纤陀螺寻北仪与准直经纬仪结构一体化方案。

definition: level (device to determine horizontal)/spirit level/surveyor's level
level (device to determine horizontal)/spirit level/surveyor's level
set square (tool to measure right angles)
